<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Barreling Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=4787) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 143 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 78 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Rivethun Invoker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=309) (Level 6), [Wylderheart](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=318) (Level 6)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You rush forward, moving enemies aside to reach your foe. You [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=2305), attempting to move through your enemies’ spaces. Roll an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check and compare the result to the Fortitude DC of each creature whose space you attempt to move through during your Stride, moving through its space on a success but ending your movement before entering its space on a failure. You can then [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306), regardless of how your Stride ended. You can use Barreling Charge to [Burrow](/Actions.aspx?ID=2310), [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=2374), [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=2312), or [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=2381) instead of Stride if you have the corresponding movement type.

<title level="2">Barreling Charge leads to...</title>
[Overpowering Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=4829)
name: Barreling Charge
